Text: Summer clerksMy nephew is currently attending his first year of law school He is looking for some summer employment opportunities within law firms or corporates Does Enrons legal group hire any summer interns If so who could I send his resume to for consideration If there is any other guidance I could give to him I would be appreciative thanks Jeff

Summer clerksMy nephew is currently attending his first year of law school He is looking for some summer employment opportunities within law firms or corporates Does Enrons legal group hire any summer interns If so who could I send his resume to for consideration If there is any other guidance I could give to him I would be appreciative thanks Jeff

Re Bond Trading Agreements Cc the right thing to do thx jeff From Sheila Glover AM To Sara CT cc Mike NRON Jeff CT Subject Bond Trading Agreements Sara If it is a fairly straight forward task to move the Credit and Convertible books into Enron North America we should negotiate the new agreements in the name of Enron North America If is is going to take more time then we should go ahead in the name of ECT Investments and change it to ENA as soon as the books are moved Please advise Thanks Sheila

Re Bear Stearns Securities Loan Agreementits not to difficult lets use the ISDA format I can live with the other language if need be thanks jeff From Sara Shackleton on AM To Jeff CT cc Subject Re Bear Stearns Securities Loan Agreement Jeff Do you have a preferance regarding the payment of Default Interest Please let me know Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM Tanya Rohauer AM To Sara CT cc Subject Re Bear Stearns Securities Loan Agreement I think this is Kinnemans decision To the extent that an agreement uses a rate that may result in PL when it is pulled out of the book that is his risk Not too big of an issue from my perspective From Sara Shackleton on AM To Tanya CT cc Subject Bear Stearns Securities Loan Agreement Tanya We finally agreed on the guaranty form the cap is million and are about ready to execute the actual agreement I have one question in the ISDA world we use cost of funds plus as the default interest rate The Bear document provides interest thereon at a rate equal to A in the case of purchases of Foreign Securities LIBOR B in the case of purchases of any other securities or other amounts if any due to Lender hereunder the Federal Funds Rate or C such other rate as may be specified in Schedule B in each case as such rate fluctuates from day to day from the date of such purchase until the date of payment of such excess What is your preference Bears standard language or do you want to specify another rate Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax

Re Bond Trading Agreements Cc the right thing to do thx jeff From Sheila Glover AM To Sara CT cc Mike NRON Jeff CT Subject Bond Trading Agreements Sara If it is a fairly straight forward task to move the Credit and Convertible books into Enron North America we should negotiate the new agreements in the name of Enron North America If is is going to take more time then we should go ahead in the name of ECT Investments and change it to ENA as soon as the books are moved Please advise Thanks Sheila
